definition: to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Through the ages, attracts numerous tourists haidai sea.
sentences.chinese: 古往今來，岱海吸引着無數遊人。

sentences.english: There have been various views about life and death through the ages.
sentences.chinese: 對人的生與死的看法即生死觀，古往今來與時俱變。

sentences.english: For the master yogis of the past and present, the greatest seal is Emptiness.
sentences.chinese: 對於古往今來的瑜伽大師來說，大法印就是空性。

sentences.english: Through the ages, the earth mother milk with sweet nurtured a countless generations.
sentences.chinese: 古往今來，地球媽媽用甘甜的乳汁哺育了無數代子孫。

sentences.english: Adapt or perish, now as ever, is Nature's inexorable imperative. - H. G. Wells.
sentences.chinese: 適應或是死亡，古往今來都是自然界的無情法則。

sentences.english: All down the ages some have been enabled to "taste and see that the Lord is good."
sentences.chinese: 古往今來，有些人“感受並親見了上帝的美好”。

sentences.english: Since ancient times, have emerged out of how many honest and upright official Lian Li.
sentences.chinese: 古往今來，湧現出了多少個清官廉吏。

sentences.english: From ancient to modern times, really hold up a life of wide mansion, several people?
sentences.chinese: 古往今來，真正撐起一座人生廣廈的，能有幾人？

definition: prosperity and decline (of a kingdom)/rise and fall
after hard work and numerous revisions (idiom)/the vicissitudes of life
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
"Redology", academic field devoted to the study of A Dream of Red Mansions
a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
tied up in a bundle on a high shelf/to put sth on the back burner/no longer a high priority
